atomName2="S_1"/> <Bond atomName1="O_5" atomName2="S_1"/> </Residue> </Residues> <CustomBondForce energy="(De*((1 - exp(-beta*(r-bondlength)))^2-1)+D0)"> <PerBondParameter name="beta"/> <PerBondParameter name="De"/> <PerBondParameter name="D0"/> <PerBondParameter name="bondlength"/> <Bond class1="o2_b" class2="s3_b" beta="20" De="400" D0="0" bondlength="0.1496"/> </CustomBondForce> <HarmonicAngleForce energy="0"> <Angle class1="o2_b" class2="s3_b" class3="o2_b" k="300" angle="1.961750079242"/> </HarmonicAngleForce> <CustomAngleForce energy="0"/> <RBTorsionForce energy="0"/> <PeriodicTorsionForce energy="0"/> <CustomNonbondedForce energy="select(epsilon*sigma,(((2*epsilon)/(1-(3/(gamma+3)))) * (1.0/(1.0+(r/sigma)^6)) * ((3/(gamma+3))*exp(gamma*(1-(r/sigma)))-1)),0)" bondCutoff="0"> <GlobalParameter name="pot-WANG_BUCKINGHAM" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="pot-COULOMB_GAUSSIAN" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-epsilon_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-gamma_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-sigma_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="nexcl" defaultValue="0"/> <GlobalParameter name="prefactor-" defaultValue="1"/> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="sigma"/> <PerParticleParameter name="epsilon"/> <PerParticleParameter
